Description: Defines what table this rule applies to

Type: optional list of valid items from the type list for table
Description: Optional type restriction for this rule

Determines handling of existing values in target element. See flowchart below. addIfEmpty: set relationships only if none exist; overwrite: replace relationships; merge: add relationships that do not already exist

Type: A valid bundle specifier for either a intrinsic field, labels or an attribute
Description: Determines the prepopulate target. Note that if you want to target a List attribute, you have to provide a valid list item idno or id for that list as value!
Allows for rule based skipping of the rule. If the expression result is true, the rule is ignored for the current record.
This defines the actual content that is injected into the targetelement. The display template is evaluated against the current record.

parent = copy relationships from the parent; children = copy relationships from children; related = copy relationships from related records (Eg. if table = ca_objects and target = ca_entities copy all entity relationships from related objects)
For use with "context." Use this setting to only copy relationships with the specified relationship type codes
For use with "context." Don't copy relationships with these specified relationship type codes
For use with "context." Only copy relationships pointing to specified types.
For use with "context." Only copy relationships pointing to specified types.
For use with "context." Don't copy relationships pointing to specified types.
For use with "context." Only consider "current" relationships â€“ Eg. current storage location
